elements.title: #DRIVE Rally
elements.description: #DRIVE Rally lets you relive the 90s in the most exciting era in motorsport history, where dust, mud, and snow are badges of honor. Unleash the raw power of legendary rally beasts, admire every second of the stunning landscapes, and remember: the faster you go, the better!

elements.title: 'n Verlore Verstand
elements.description: Be prepared to be transported to a reality of dreams and nightmares. What will you discover about yourself in this journey through the subconscious?

elements.title: 1,000 Rogue Bucks
elements.description: 1000 in-game Rogue Bucks for Rogue Company.

elements.title: 100 Doors - Escape from Prison
elements.description: Meet Beren, a curious journalist trapped in a prison building. Help her solve mind-bending riddles, find hidden objects, and escape home safely. She needs your knowledge to break free. Open 100 doors, escape rooms, and challenge your brain with mind-bending riddles and puzzles!

elements.title: 100 Doors - Escape from Work
elements.description: You get a job, you get stuck, you want to escape! Solve logical puzzles, find hidden objects and unlock more than 100 doors to find the way out.

elements.title: 100 Doors Escape: Let me In!
elements.description: Get ready to laugh and think in Let Me Poop! With 100 unique rooms to escape from, challenge your mind with clever puzzles and quirky scenarios. Let the fun begin!

elements.title: 100 Halloweens
elements.description: Trapped in a mansion filled with 100 years of darkness... Fight or hide, stay alive and set things right.

elements.title: 100 Point Pack
elements.description: These Points can be redeemed for microtransactions.

elements.title: 100 Worlds - Escape the room
elements.description: Mya set out on yet another adventure. She found herself stuck in an ancient magic book and now has to solve various problems, riddles, and puzzles. Your task is to work out the solutions with Mya. In case you get stuck, you can use hints and other help to pass the levels.

elements.title: 1000 Audience
elements.description: 1000 Audience

elements.title: 1000 Gems
elements.description: 1000 Gems

elements.title: 1000 Gold
elements.description: Gold is the premium currency of Armored Warfare, allowing you to purchase such items in the game as Premium vehicles, Premium Time, Insignia tokens and other boosters as well as vehicle customization options.

elements.title: 10000 Audience
elements.description: 10000 Audience

elements.title: 1000xRESIST
elements.description: 1000xRESIST is a thrilling sci-fi adventure. The year is unknown, and a disease spread by an alien invasion keeps you underground. You are Watcher. You dutifully fulfil your purpose in serving the ALLMOTHER, until the day you discover a shocking secret that changes everything.

seller.name: Surprise Attack Pty Ltd DBA Fellow Traveller Games

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw Castles And Palaces
elements.description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Castles and Palaces is a jigsaw puzzle game and tour guide with 500 high-quality photos

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw Cute Cats
elements.description: A new game in the series of 1001 Puzzles. Cute, funny, cozy cats will melt even the coldest hearts! Assemble the puzzle pieces and enjoy the cute faces of pets.

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 2
elements.description: Already a favorite puzzle from the series of games "1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 2." Adorable and clumsy kittens will cheer you up!

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Earth Chronicles
elements.description: Special edition! 1001 unique photos in a new jigsaw!

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Home Sweet Home
elements.description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Home Sweet Home is an exciting puzzle game and comfort of being at home in 500 high-quality photos.

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery
elements.description: 1001 Jigsaw. Legends of Mystery has 500 photos to prove the existence of magic!

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Australian Puzzles
elements.description: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour: Australia is an exciting jigsaw puzzle game and tour guide with 500 high-quality photos

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Great America
elements.description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Great America is a puzzle game and adventure into the heart of America in 500 high-quality images.

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: London
elements.description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: London 2 Puzzles is a puzzle game and adventure into the heart of London in 500 high-quality images.

elements.title: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 2
elements.description: The chronicles of planet earth in 1001 photos! Continue your unbelievable journey to study our world with Earth Chronicles 2!

elements.title: 112th Seed
elements.description: In a future where Earth has become uninhabitable and food is so scarce that most of humanity has perished, take the role of a seed that could restore hope! Make your way through the last labs constructed to cultivate a plant species capable of surviving any environment.

elements.title: 12 orbits
elements.description: 12 orbits is the only local multiplayer game for 2-12 people at once, no matter what you play on. A single keyboard is all you need!

elements.title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia
elements.description: Medieval Europe is in the middle of religious upheaval and many a preacher predict the imminent end of the world. Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy story with true historical events in the background. You'll be facing intricate puzzles, challenging battles and cunning stealth.

elements.title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Deluxe Edition
elements.description: The deluxe edition includes 1428: Shadows over Silesia, the soundtrack and two written stories from the world of the game.

elements.title: 1775 Rebellion
elements.description: Command the armies of the British Redcoats, English Loyalists, German Hessians, American Regulars, Patriots, French Regulars and Native Americans to decide the fate of the Americas!

elements.title: 1971 Indian Naval Front
elements.description: Learn about the biggest naval conflict since WWII. Third-person vehicular combat game based on the 1971 India-Pakistan war. Conduct missions based on actual events. Control naval units including aircraft carriers, warships, jets and choppers.

elements.description: 20 Minutes Till Dawn is a survival roguelite where endless hordes of creatures lurk from the dark. Craft an array of overpowering builds and eradicate waves of Lovecraftian nightmares. Will you be able to survive the night?
